id.story: Owns a secret Black Jade mine under her family's more modest "Wayne Manor". Someone has developed an anti-psychotic drug using Black and Green Jade that has helped her schizophrenic younger sister. Owns The Blooming Lotus, a drug den in the Terminal Strip neighborhood of Kausao City under the pseudonym of "Madame Lotus". Relationship w/Jianghu (江湖; lit. "rivers and lakes") is unclear. Probably travels in upper crust social circles. Employs Hamza Abu-Talat and Steffan Gilios at The Blooming Lotus. Naramel. The mining company owned by her family is smaller than any of the big 5 from pg96. Speaks Naramel natively, Kaiyu at Junior High student level, and Túyàngan and Aerish functionally as a glamorous rich person who's not trying too hard.
